name: Avoid empty Includes
description:
This metric retrieves all ABAP Includes that contains no statements. 

Includes generated by SAP for function groups (ending by "UXX") are excluded.
output:
This report lists all ABAP includes that contain no statements. 
It provides the following information:
- ABAP Includes full name
rationale: For maintainability aspect, avoid ABAP Includes that contains no statements.
remediation: Check if the Include is referenced. If not, then you can envisage to remove it.
